funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by funds from UNAIDS ( http://www.unaids.org/en). RH receives support from the MRC UK ( https://mrc.ukri.org/) and DFID ( https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-international-development)--MRC Grant Reference MR/K012126/1. The funders had no role in preparation of the manuscript or decision to publish (however, UNAIDS staff provided feedback on drafts).
